titlestmt.titleproper:
Documents Relating to San Juan de la Boquillas y Nogales Land Grant, 1833-1901
(bulk 1879-1899)
Documents Relating to San Juan de la Boquillas y Nogales Land Grant,

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Documents Relating to San Juan de la Boquillas y Nogales Land Grant, 1833-1901 (bulk 1879-1899)
did.abstract: Typescript and printed materials, chiefly deeds of sale 1879-1899, relating to the San Juan de la Boquillas y Nogales land grant. Land originally granted to Captain Ygnacio Elias Gonzales and Juan Nepomucino Felix. Included are documents filed with Court of Private Land Claims by William R. Hearst and Phoebe A. Hearst concerning rights to this land in 1891.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

bioghist.p: Documents possibly gathered in relation to Court of Private Land Claims Case.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript and printed materials, chiefly deeds of sale 1879-1899, relating to the San Juan de la Boquillas y Nogales land grant. Land originally granted to Captain Ygnacio Elias Gonzales and Juan Nepomucino Felix. Included are documents filed with Court of Private Land Claims by William R. Hearst and Phoebe A. Hearst concerning rights to this land in 1891.
